Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulatedPlayer
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulatedPlayer
    A representation of a player, holding a given two cards
    Author:
    brendansullivan
